task.title: Editing a server
task.shortdesc: You can edit your server using a server editor. The fields that you change are dependant on what runtime environment the server is defined to use, or whether it is defined as a local or remote server.

step.cmd: Open a server editor, completing one of the following:

choices.choice: In the Servers view, double-click on the server that you want to edit.
Right-click on the server in the Servers view, from the pop-up menu select Open.

step.cmd: When the server editor is open on the workbench, you can save your changes by either selecting from the toolbar File Save or type CTRL+S.

info.note: Changes to the server editor that has not yet been saved is indicated with a * icon located at the top of the server editor. After you save your edits on the server editor, the * icon should no longer appear on the server editor.

step.cmd: Make sure that the editor is closed before starting, restarting, or adding and removing modules on the server.
